column1: #text=When I was riding my bike this past summer , one of my tires went flat .
#text=I noticed it went flat because it felt bumpy while I was riding down the street .
#text=I wheeled my bike home while walking next to it and pushing it .
#text=I asked my dad to help me fix the flat tire because I had never done it before .
#text=He gave me the materials I needed to fix it , and he explained how to go about fixing it .
#text=To my surprise , it was very easy to fix the flat tire .
#text=I just had to patch up the hole with the materials he gave me .
#text=After I patched up the hole , I used an air pump to put air in both of my tires .
#text=This completed the repair process for me .
#text=The next day , I rode my bike again and I did not have any problems with the tire .
